ComicInfo.Title: Frank and the Proper Breakdown of His Origin Story
ComicInfo.Series: Strong Box: The Big Bad Book of Boon
ComicInfo.Summary:
"FRANK AND THE PROPER BREAKDOWN OF HIS ORIGIN STORY"
Taking a trip down memory lane through the 1930s, '40s and '50s, we explore the humble roots of Frank Boon, highlighting some of the key events that shaped his character into what has now earned him the distinguished moniker of "Mr. Hard & Practical." Meanwhile, Dixon is confronted by the vioolent Chugwater gang known as the "Hoods" in what is sure to end in epic bloodshed...
ContentsIt was at this place and at this timeRegarding the riddle of Frank BoonTaking it down the slopeA colder and darker conflict
